topic.title: Internet Enabled Therapy Integrated Software Engine
topic.shortdesc: An Internet Enabled Therapy Integrated Software Engine is software that enables information, such as progress notes and outcomes, to be shared electronically between an Internet Enabled Therapy Programme and a PATIENT’s clinical record.
